main_definition: Brunei is a small, wealthy Southeast Asian nation located on the northern coast of the island of Borneo.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A country in Asia known for its oil and gas reserves
meanings_and_examples.example: Brunei is one of the richest countries in the world due to its significant natural resource wealth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The official language spoken in Brunei
meanings_and_examples.example: Malay, also known as Brunei Malay or Standard Malay, is the national and official language of Brunei.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of hair color commonly found among people from Southeast Asia, including those from Brunei
meanings_and_examples.example: The prevalence of dark brown hair in Bruneian citizens can be attributed to genetic factors common in the region.
